name: Shaker (ZYCyanis)
description:
[Single mode]

Control the position of the mouth passing through the pedal (press the mouse is OK). Garbage and marine life randomly move from left right.Players should aim at their mouths before entering garbage. If garbage enters your mouth, you will be deducted 1 point for success, 1 point for eating marine life, and 1 point for missing a piece of garbage.

[Double Mode]

Two players control their pedals. (in the game, I set the keyboard keys so as to test, a and l), and see who presses fast (just like a wrist wrench, for example, if you press it, you will move to the opposite side of a small distance, and those who press more will win slowly), and these two characters will move slowly.
